channel.title: [req] pvp mode [req]
channel.description:
Hello! i have been searching hours for a pvp mode, i have not found one direct link to make one,
what im requesting is a npc that when you click on it comes up with a interface saying Would you like your pvp mode on?
YES! or NO!
Then I would like when they click yes for everywhere to be wildy, they dont teleport anywhere, im not asking for pk box's.
if you give me the codes please tell me where to place them.
Btw this is not a delta source, its silab,
Thanks,
~Ultimate k0~

I wasnt requesting a source i was requesting the pvp code ty anyway

item.title: [req] pvp mode [req]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It’s called PvP Corruption. Now that you know the name, you don’t have to post in the wrong section. You cannot request sources here.

Read full topic
